title: Authentication | Creatio Academy
content: This is documentation for Creatio 8.0 . For up-to-date documentation, see the latest version ( 8.3 ). Version: 8.0 Set up SSO via Azure AD Set up SSO via Okta Set up SSO via AD FS Single Sign-On Set up SSO via Cognito AWS Set up SSO via OneLogin Set up JIT Provisioning Windows authentication
markdown:
This is documentation for Creatio **8.0**.

For up-to-date documentation, see the **[latest version](/docs/8.x/setup-and-administration/category/authentication)** (8.3).

Version: 8.0[Set up SSO via Azure AD](/docs/8.x/setup-and-administration/8.0/administration/user-and-access-management/authentication/set-up-sso-via-azure-ad)[Set up SSO via Okta](/docs/8.x/setup-and-administration/8.0/administration/user-and-access-management/authentication/set-up-sso-via-okta)[Set up SSO via AD FS](/docs/8.x/setup-and-administration/8.0/administration/user-and-access-management/authentication/single-sign-on-via-adfs)[Single Sign-On](/docs/8.x/setup-and-administration/8.0/administration/user-and-access-management/authentication/single-sign-on)[Set up SSO via Cognito AWS](/docs/8.x/setup-and-administration/8.0/administration/user-and-access-management/authentication/single-sign-on-via-cognito)[Set up SSO via OneLogin](/docs/8.x/setup-and-administration/8.0/administration/user-and-access-management/authentication/single-sign-on-via-custom-provider)[Set up JIT Provisioning](/docs/8.x/setup-and-administration/8.0/administration/user-and-access-management/authentication/just-in-time-user-provisioning)[Windows authentication](/docs/8.x/setup-and-administration/8.0/administration/user-and-access-management/authentication/windows-authentication)
